p:
The test was performed in triplicate. The antioxidant activity was calculated according to Gulle et al. [ 54]:
(%AA) = 100 − {[(Abs sample − Abs white) × 100] / Abs control}
%AA = percentage of antioxidant activity
Abs sample = Sample Absorbance
Abs white = Absorbance of white
Abs control = Control Absorbance
